com.wordpress.loeper.kvv.base.model

Class Trip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wordpress.loeper.kvv.base.model.Trip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class Trip
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
    This class represents a trip. A trip consists of multiple sections that suggest how to get to the destination.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Martin Löper

      • getName

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getName()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the name of the trip. This might useful for localization, but is otherwise useless (and therefore considered to be removed in the future)...
        Returns:
        the label of the trip (i.e. 1.Journey)

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object pOtherObject)

        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • getInterval

        public long[] getInterval()
        Returns the interval in which the trip will be done.
        Returns:
        an array containing the start value at index 0 and the end value at index 1 (both are UNIX timestamps in seconds)

      • getIntervalAsString

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String[] getIntervalAsString()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the interval in the relative format as it is received by the KVV server.
        Returns:
        an array containing the start value at index 0 and the end value at index 1 (both are Strings formatted the following way: 1:22 - that means: HH:mm)
        See Also:
        getInterval()

      • getDurationAsString

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getDurationAsString()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the duration of the trip.
        Returns:
        the duration of the trip in the following format: HH:mm
        See Also:
        getDuration()
